item.title: Two Sum
item.description: Solution: HashMap, Two Pointer Note: hashmap: dictionay to store key as num, value as index. tow pointer: sorted and find original index. Need to consider the same value Code: hashmap class Solution: def twoSum(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]: hashMap = {} for i, num in enumerate(nums): rest = target - num if rest in hashMap: return [i, hashMap[rest] ] hashMap[num] = i Time Complexity: O(n) Space Complexity: O(n)
